description.value: You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Disguise], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Object], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Scene] to your spell list, which you cast as primal spells.
